channel.title: Hellllppppp
channel.description:
Need help if i dont portforward cause i dont have a router can i still host a server i just did the add ports to exeption list in firewall
i put in my ip in the server and compile run no errors but when i try the status check on and it dosent work ???
like its offline but the server is online :( like in the box??
what do i do ?

okay i turn on server than utorrent

lol i know i shouldent i just want to see if i can

and mabey host for like 3 of my freinds or mabey not but no more than 5 people and just want to make the server status checker say online

so can anyone help???

just need to get it online

item.title: Hellllppppp
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

If you’re on dial up you shouldn’t even bother attempting to host a server. Get someone with a good, dedicated, high speed computer to host for you. People will do it for pretty cheap.

Read full topic

item.title: Hellllppppp
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Crown2, post:3, topic:347078”]well i have dial up so i connect through my phone line to internet

but i di that thing in firewall to let the port be recognized or what ever and i can run like all servers on 127.0.0.1

sooo???[/quote]
I do not suggest hosting a server on dial-up as your internet is slow enough as it is. Also, 127.0.0.1 is local-host, aka, your computer only.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

You need to portforward. How do you have internet but no router.
